腅字的基本解释

腅
dàn
肉。
肴。
一同喝酒，一同吃饭。

腅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dàn］
［《廣韻》徒濫切，去闞，定。］
(1)肉。
(2)肴馔。
(3)一起吃饭喝酒。

腅字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　腅； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页986第08
【廣韻】【集韻】?徒濫切，音憺。肉也。【博雅】肌膚者，腅也。【玉篇】肴也。　又【博雅】相飮也。　又【五音集韻】徒紺切，音醰。相飯也。

腅字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
腅字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Tang
dàn
meat.
meat dish.
Drink together, eat together.
Tang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dàn］
["Guangyun" cut indiscriminately, go to Kan, set. ]
(1) Meat.
(2) Delicacy.
(3) Eat and drink together.
Tang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　腅; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 986-08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Discretionary cut, low sound. Meat too. 【Bo Ya】Skinned people, fascinated. 【Jade articles】Dishes too.　[Bo Ya] It's also the same.　[Pentagram Collection Rhyme] It’s just cut, and the sound is 醰. Xiangfan also.
